ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Title: GeoServer Web Feature Service
ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Abstract: This is the reference implementation of WFS 1.0.0 and WFS 1.1.0, supports all WFS operations including Transaction.

FeatureType.Name: superfund:superfund-atsdr-hazardous-waste-site-v2
FeatureType.Title: ATSDR Hazardous Waste Sites
FeatureType.Abstract: ATSDR Hazardous Waste Site Polygon Data, v2 (2010) displays 2,080 polygons for selected hazardous waste sites that were compiled on May 26, 2010. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H48P5XF7.

FeatureType.Name: superfund:superfund-atsdr-hazardous-waste-site-ciesin-mod-v2
FeatureType.Title: ATSDR Hazardous Waste Sites on National Priorities List
FeatureType.Abstract: ATSDR Hazardous Waste Site Polygon Data with CIESIN Modifications, v2 (2010) displays georeferenced data for 1,572 National Priorities List (NPL) Superfund sites. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4DF6P5Z.

FeatureType.Name: ipcc:ipcc-synthetic-vulnerability-climate-2005-2050-2100
FeatureType.Title: Climate Change Vulnerability Scenarios 2005, 2050, 2100
FeatureType.Abstract: Synthetic Assessment of Global Distribution of Vulnerability to Climate Change, v1 (2005, 2050, 2100) displays 11 scenarios of climate change vulnerability based on the Vulnerability-Resilience Indicator Model (VRIM). See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4XG9P2R.

FeatureType.Name: crop-climate:crop-climate-effects-climate-global-food-production
FeatureType.Title: Crop Climate: Maize, Rice, and Wheat
FeatureType.Abstract: Effects of Climate Change on Global Food Production from SRES Emissions and Socioeconomic Scenarios, v1 (1970-2080): Maize, Rice, and Wheat displays the potential implications of climate change on staple crop production yields. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4JM27JZ.

FeatureType.Name: urbanspatial:urbanspatial-dar-es-salaam-luse_1982
FeatureType.Title: Dar es Salaam Land Use and Informal Settlement: 1982
FeatureType.Abstract: Dar es Salaam Land Use and Informal Settlement Data Set (1982, 1992, 1998, 2002): 1982 displays the urban land use and informal settlement areas for the year 1982. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H43T9F56.

FeatureType.Name: urbanspatial:urbanspatial-dar-es-salaam-luse_1992
FeatureType.Title: Dar es Salaam Land Use and Informal Settlement: 1992
FeatureType.Abstract: Dar es Salaam Land Use and Informal Settlement Data Set (1982, 1992, 1998, 2002): 1992 displays the urban land use and informal settlement areas for the year 1992. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H43T9F56.

FeatureType.Name: urbanspatial:urbanspatial-dar-es-salaam-luse_1998
FeatureType.Title: Dar es Salaam Land Use and Informal Settlement: 1998
FeatureType.Abstract: Dar es Salaam Land Use and Informal Settlement Data Set (1982, 1992, 1998, 2002): 1998 displays the urban land use and informal settlement areas for the year 1998. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H43T9F56.

FeatureType.Name: urbanspatial:urbanspatial-dar-es-salaam-luse_2002
FeatureType.Title: Dar es Salaam Land Use and Informal Settlement: 2002
FeatureType.Abstract: Dar es Salaam Land Use and Informal Settlement Data Set (1982, 1992, 1998, 2002): 2002 displays the urban land use and informal settlement areas for the year 2002. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H43T9F56.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2010_agriculture
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2010: Agriculture
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Performance Index, 2010 Release (1994-2009): Agriculture displays the indicators within the agriculture policy category of EPI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4D21VHT.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2010_air-pollution-effects-on-ecosystems
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2010: Air Pollution Effects on Ecosystems
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Performance Index, 2010 Release (1994-2009): Air Pollution Effects on Ecosystems displays the indicators within the air pollution effects on ecosystems policy category of EPI. policy category of EPI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4D21VHT.

FeatureType.Title: EPI 2010: Air Pollution Effects on Human Health

FeatureType.Title: EPI 2010: Biodiversity and Habitat
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Performance Index, 2010 Release (1994-2009): Biodiversity and Habitat displays the indicators within the biodiversity and habitat policy category of EPI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4D21VHT.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2010_climate-change
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2010: Climate Change
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Performance Index, 2010 Release (1994-2009): Climate Change displays the indicators within the climate change policy category of EPI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4D21VHT.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2010_environmental-burden-of-disease
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2010: Environmental Burden of Disease
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Performance Index, 2010 Release (1994- 2009): Environmental Burden of Disease displays the indicators within the environmental burden of disease policy category of EPI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4D21VHT.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2010_fisheries
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2010: Fisheries
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Performance Index, 2010 Release (1994- 2009): Fisheries displays the indicators within the fisheries policy category of EPI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4D21VHT.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2010_forestry
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2010: Forestry
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Performance Index, 2010 Release (1994-2009): Forestry displays the indicators within the forestry policy category of EPI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4D21VHT.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2010_water-effects-on-ecosystems
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2010: Water Effects on Ecosystems
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Performance Index, 2010 Release (1994-2009): Water Effects on Ecosystems displays the indicators within the water effects on ecosystems policy category of EPI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4D21VHT.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2010_water-effects-on-human-health
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2010: Water Effects on Human Health
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Performance Index, 2010 Release (1994-2009): Water Effects on Human Health displays the indicators within the water effects on human health policy category of EPI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4D21VHT.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2014_ev
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2014: Ecosystem Vitality Objective
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Performance Index, 2014 Release (2002-2011): Ecosystem Vitality Objective, displays ecosystem vitality scores that are based on six constituent policy categories: water resources, agriculture, forests, fisheries, biodiversity and habitat, and climate and energy. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H48913SG.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2014_ev-agriculture
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2014: Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Agriculture
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Performance Index, 2014 Release (2002-2011): Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Agriculture, displays the 2014 EPI ecosystem vitality objective, agriculture category that includes the following indicators: pesticide regulation and agricultural subsidies. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H48913SG.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2014_ev-biodiversity-and-habitat
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2014: Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Biodiversity and Habitat
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Performance Index, 2014 Release (2002-2011): Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Biodiversity and Habitat, displays the 2014 EPI ecosystem vitality objective, biodiversity and habitat category that includes the following indicators: critical habitat protection, marine protected areas, global biome protection and national biome protection. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H48913SG.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2014_ev-climate-and-energy
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2014: Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Climate and Energy
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Performance Index, 2014 Release (2002-2011): Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Climate and Energy, displays the 2014 EPI ecosystem vitality objective, climate and energy category that includes the following indicators: trend in CO2 emissions per kWh, change of trend in carbon intensity and trend in carbon intensity. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H48913SG.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2014_ev-fisheries
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2014: Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Fisheries
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Performance Index, 2014 Release (2002-2011): Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Fisheries, displays the 2014 EPI ecosystem vitality objective, fisheries category that includes the following indicators: fish stocks and coastal shelf fishing pressure. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H48913SG.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2014_ev-forests
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2014: Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Forests
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Performance Index, 2014 Release (2002-2011): Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Forests, displays the 2014 EPI ecosystem vitality objective, forest category that includes the change in forest cover indicator. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H48913SG.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2014_ev-water-resources
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2014: Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Water Resources
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Performance Index, 2014 Release (2002-2011): Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Water Resources, displays the 2014 EPI ecosystem vitality objective, water resources category that includes the wastewater treatment indicator. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H48913SG.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2014_eh
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2014: Environmental Health Objective
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Performance Index, 2014 Release (2002-2011): Environmental Health Objective, displays the environmental health scores that are based on three constituent policy categories: health impacts, air quality, and water and sanitation. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H48913SG.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2014_eh-air-quality
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2014: Environmental Health Objective - Air Quality
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Performance Index, 2014 Release (2002-2011): Environmental Health Objective - Air Quality, displays the 2014 EPI environmental health objective air quality category that includes the following indicators: household air quality, air pollution and exposure to PM2.5 and air pollution PM2.5 exceedance. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H48913SG.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2014_eh-health-impacts
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2014: Environmental Health Objective - Health Impacts
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Performance Index, 2014 Release (2002-2011): Environmental Health Objective - Health Impacts, displays the 2014 EPI environmental health objective, health impacts category that includes the child mortality indicator. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H48913SG.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2014_eh-water-and-sanitation
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2014: Environmental Health Objective - Water and Sanitation
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Performance Index, 2014 Release (2002-2011): Environmental Health Objective - Water and Sanitation, displays the 2014 EPI environmental health objective, water and sanitation category that includes the following indicators: access to drinking water and access to sanitation. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H48913SG.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2014_percent-change
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2014: Ten-Year Percent Change
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Performance Index, 2014 Release (2002-2011): Ten-Year Percent Change, displays the 10-year percent change in EPI scores for each country included in the 2014 EPI that shows the countries that are improving and declining. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H48913SG.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2016
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2016
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2016 map layer is part of the 2016 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the 2016 EPI ranks from 180 countries on 20 performance indicators in the following 9 policy categories: health impacts, air quality, water and sanitation, water resources, agriculture, forests, fisheries, biodiversity and habitat, and climate and energy. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4FX77CS.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2016_ev
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2016_Ecosystem Vitality Objective
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2016_Ecosystem Vitality Objective map layer is part of the 2016 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays ecosystem vitality scores that are based on six constituent policy categories: water resources, agriculture, forests, fisheries, biodiversity and habitat, and climate and energy. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4FX77CS.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2016_ev-agriculture
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2016_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Agriculture
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2016_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Agriculture map layer is part of the 2016 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the 2016 EPI ecosystem vitality objective, agriculture category that includes the following indicators: nitrogen balance and nitrogen use efficiency. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4FX77CS.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2016_ev-biodiversity-and-habitat
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2016_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Biodiversity and Habitat
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2016_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Biodiversity and Habitat map layer is part of the 2016 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the 2016 EPI ecosystem vitality objective, biodiversity and habitat category that includes the following indicators: marine protected areas, terrestrial biome protection (global and national), and species protection (global and national). See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4FX77CS.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2016_ev-climate-and-energy
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2016_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Climate and Energy
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2016_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Climate and Energy map layer is part of the 2016 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the 2016 EPI ecosystem vitality objective, climate and energy category that includes the following indicators: trend in carbon intensity per kWh and trend in carbon intensity. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4FX77CS.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2016_ev-fisheries
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2016_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Fisheries
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2016_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Fisheries map layer is part of the 2016 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the 2016 EPI ecosystem vitality objective, fisheries category that includes the fish stocks indicator. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4FX77CS.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2016_ev-forests
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2016_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Forests
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2016_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Forests map layer is part of the 2016 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the 2016 EPI ecosystem vitality objective, forest category that includes the change in forest cover indicator. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4FX77CS.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2016_ev-water-resources
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2016_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Water Resources
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2016_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Water Resources map layer is part of the 2016 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the 2016 EPI ecosystem vitality objective, water resources category that includes the wastewater treatment indicator. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4FX77CS.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2016_eh
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2016_Environmental Health Objective
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2016_Environmental Health Objective map layer is part of the 2016 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the environmental health scores that are based on three constituent policy categories: health impacts, air quality, and water and sanitation. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4FX77CS.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2016_eh-air-quality
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2016_Environmental Health Objective - Air Quality
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2016_Environmental Health Objective - Air Quality map layer is part of the 2016 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the 2016 EPI environmental health objective, air quality category that includes the following indicators: household air quality, air pollution average exposure to fine particulate matter (PM2.5), air pollution fine particulate matter (PM2.5) exceedance, and air pollution average exposure to nitrogen dioxide (NO2). See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4FX77CS.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2016_eh-health-impacts
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2016_Environmental Health Objective - Health Impacts
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2016_Environmental Health Objective - Health Impacts is part of the 2016 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the 2016 EPI environmental health objective, health impacts category that includes the environmental risk exposure indicator. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4FX77CS.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2016_eh-water-and-sanitation
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2016_Environmental Health Objective - Water and Sanitation
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2016_Environmental Health Objective - Water and Sanitation map layer is part of the 2016 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the 2016 EPI environmental health objective, water and sanitation category that includes the following indicators: unsafe drinking water and unsafe sanitation. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4FX77CS.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2016_percent-change
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2016_Ten-Year Percent Change
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2016_Ten-Year Percent Change map layer is part of the 2016 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the 10-year percent change in EPI scores for each country included in the 2016 EPI, and whether countries are improving or declining. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4FX77CS.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2018
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2018
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2018 map layer is part of the 2018 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the 2018 EPI ranks from 180 countries on 24 performance indicators across the following ten issue categories: air quality, water and sanitation, heavy metals, biodiversity and habitat, forests, fisheries, climate and energy, air pollution, water resources, and agriculture. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4X928CF.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2018_eco
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2018_Ecosystem Vitality Objective
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2018_Ecosystem Vitality Objective map layer is part of the 2018 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays 2018 EPI ecosystem vitality objective scores that are based on seven issue categories: biodiversity and habitat, forests, fisheries, climate and energy, air pollution, water resources, and agriculture. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4X928CF.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2018_eco-agriculture
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2018_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Agriculture
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2018_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Agriculture map layer is part of the 2018 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the 2018 EPI ecosystem vitality objective, agriculture issue category that includes the sustainable nitrogen management indicator. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4X928CF.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2018_eco-air-pollution
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2018_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Air Pollution
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2018_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Air Pollution map layer is part of the 2018 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the 2018 EPI ecosystem vitality objective, air pollution issue category that includes the following indicators: Sulfur dioxide (SO2) emissions and nitrogen oxides (NOx) emissions. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4X928CF.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2018_eco-biodiversity-and-habitat
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2018_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Biodiversity and Habitat
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2018_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Biodiversity and Habitat map layer is part of the 2018 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the 2018 EPI ecosystem vitality objective, biodiversity and habitat issue category that includes the following indicators: marine protected areas, biome protection (global and national), species protection index, representativeness index, and species habitat index. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4X928CF.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2018_eco-climate-and-energy
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2018_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Climate and Energy
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2018_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Climate and Energy map layer is part of the 2018 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the 2018 EPI ecosystem vitality objective, climate and energy issue category that includes the following indicators: Carbon dioxide (CO2) emissions-total, CO2 emissions-power, methane (CH4) emissions, nitrous oxide (N2O) emissions, and black carbon emissions. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4X928CF.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2018_eco-fisheries
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2018_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Fisheries
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2018_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Fisheries map layer is part of the 2018 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the 2018 EPI ecosystem vitality objective, fisheries issue category that includes the following indicators: fish stock status and regional marine trophic index. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4X928CF.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2018_eco-forests
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2018_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Forests
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2018_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Forests map layer is part of the 2018 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the 2018 EPI ecosystem vitality objective, forest issue category that includes the tree cover loss indicator. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4X928CF.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2018_eco-water-resources
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2018_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Water Resources
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2018_Ecosystem Vitality Objective - Water Resources map layer is part of the 2018 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the 2018 EPI ecosystem vitality objective, water resources issue category that includes the wastewater treatment indicator. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4X928CF.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2018_hlt
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2018_Environmental Health Objective
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2018_Environmental Health Objective map layer is part of the 2018 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the 2018 EPI environmental health objective scores that are based on three issue categories: air quality, water and sanitation, and heavy metals. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4X928CF.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2018_hlt-air-quality
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2018_Environmental Health Objective - Air Quality
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2018_Environmental Health Objective - Air Quality map layer is part of the 2018 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the 2018 EPI environmental health objective, air quality issue category that includes the following indicators: household solid fuels, fine particulate matter (PM2.5) exposure, and fine particulate matter (PM2.5) exceedance. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4X928CF.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2018_hlt-heavy-metals
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2018_Environmental Health Objective - Heavy Metals
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2018_Environmental Health Objective - Heavy Metals map layer is part of the 2018 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the 2018 EPI environmental health objective, heavy metals issue category that includes the lead exposure indicator. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4X928CF.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2018_hlt-water-and-sanitation
FeatureType.Title: EPI 2018_Environmental Health Objective - Water and Sanitation
FeatureType.Abstract: The EPI 2018_Environmental Health Objective - Water and Sanitation map layer is part of the 2018 Environmental Performance Index (EPI) data set. It displays the 2018 EPI environmental health objective, water and sanitation issue category that includes the following indicators: drinking water and sanitation. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4X928CF.

FeatureType.Title: ESI 2005: Air Quality
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Sustainability Index, 2005 Release (1980-2000): Air Quality displays the air quality indicator of ESI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H40V89R6.

FeatureType.Title: ESI 2005: Biodiversity
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Sustainability Index, 2005 Release (1980-2000): Biodiversity displays the biodiversity indicator of ESI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H40V89R6.

FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Sustainability Index, 2005 Release (1980-2000): Eco-Efficiency displays the eco-efficiency indicator of ESI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H40V89R6.

FeatureType.Title: ESI 2005: Environmental Governance
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Sustainability Index, 2005 Release (1980-2000): Environmental Governance displays the environmental governance indicator of ESI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H40V89R6.

FeatureType.Title: ESI 2005: Environmental Health
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Sustainability Index, 2005 Release (1980-2000): Environmental Health displays the environmental health indicator of ESI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H40V89R6.

FeatureType.Title: ESI 2005: Greenhouse Gas Emissions
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Sustainability Index, 2005 Release (1980-2000): Greenhouse Gas Emissions displays the greenhouse gas emissions indicator of ESI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H40V89R6.

FeatureType.Title: ESI 2005: Human Sustenance
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Sustainability Index, 2005 Release (1980-2000): Human Sustenance displays the greenhouse gas emissions indicator of ESI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H40V89R6.

FeatureType.Name: esi:esi-environmental-sustainability-index-2005_land
FeatureType.Title: ESI 2005: Land
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Sustainability Index, 2005 Release (1980-2000): Land displays the land indicator of ESI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H40V89R6.

FeatureType.Title: ESI 2005: Natural Disaster Vulnerability
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Sustainability Index, 2005 Release (1980-2000): Natural Disaster Vulnerability displays the natural disaster vulnerability indicator of ESI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H40V89R6.

FeatureType.Title: ESI 2005: Natural Resource Management
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Sustainability Index, 2005 Release (1980-2000): Natural Resource Management displays the natural resource management indicator of ESI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H40V89R6.

FeatureType.Title: ESI 2005: Participation in International Collaborations

FeatureType.Title: ESI 2005: Private Sector Response
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Sustainability Index, 2005 Release (1980-2000): Private Sector Response displays the private sector response indicator of ESI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H40V89R6.

FeatureType.Title: ESI 2005: Reduction of Air Pollution
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Sustainability Index, 2005 Release (1980-2000): Reduction of Air Pollution displays the reduction of air pollution indicator of ESI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H40V89R6.

FeatureType.Title: ESI 2005: Reduction of Ecosystem Stress

FeatureType.Title: ESI 2005: Reduction of Population Pressure
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Sustainability Index, 2005 Release (1980-2000): Reduction of Population Pressure displays the reduction of population pressure indicator of ESI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H40V89R6.

FeatureType.Title: ESI 2005: Reduction of Trans-Environmental Pressure
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Sustainability Index, 2005 Release (1980-2000): Reduction of Trans-Environmental Pressure displays the reduction of trans-environmental pressure indicator of ESI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H40V89R6.

FeatureType.Name: esi:esi-environmental-sustainability-index-2005_reduce-waste-consump-press
FeatureType.Title: ESI 2005: Reduction of Waste and Consumption Pressure
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Sustainability Index, 2005 Release (1980-2000): Reduction of Waste and Consumption Pressure displays the reduction of waste and consumption pressure indicator of ESI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H40V89R6.

FeatureType.Name: esi:esi-environmental-sustainability-index-2005_reduce-water-stress
FeatureType.Title: ESI 2005: Reduction of Water Stress
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Sustainability Index, 2005 Release (1980-2000): Reduction of Water Stress displays the reduction of water stress indicator of ESI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H40V89R6.

FeatureType.Name: esi:esi-environmental-sustainability-index-2005_science-tech
FeatureType.Title: ESI 2005: Science and Technology
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Sustainability Index, 2005 Release (1980-2000): Science and Technology displays the science and technology indicator of ESI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H40V89R6.

FeatureType.Name: esi:esi-environmental-sustainability-index-2005_water-quality
FeatureType.Title: ESI 2005: Water Quality
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Sustainability Index, 2005 Release (1980-2000): Water Quality displays the water quality indicator of ESI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H40V89R6.

FeatureType.Name: esi:esi-environmental-sustainability-index-2005_water-quantity
FeatureType.Title: ESI 2005: Water Quantity
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Sustainability Index, 2005 Release (1980-2000): Water Quantity displays the water quantity indicator of ESI. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H40V89R6.

FeatureType.Name: energy:energy-pop-exposure-nuclear-plants-locations_plants
FeatureType.Title: Energy: Nuclear Power Plant Locations
FeatureType.Abstract: Population Exposure Estimates in Proximity to Nuclear Power Plants, Locations, v1 (1956-2012) displays locations of nuclear power plants. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4WH2MXH.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2010
FeatureType.Title: Environmental Performance Index 2010
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Performance Index, 2010 Release (1994-2009) displays the total EPI which ranks 163 countries on environmental performance based on 25 indicators grouped within 10 policy categories. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4D21VHT.

FeatureType.Name: epi:epi-environmental-performance-index-2014
FeatureType.Title: Environmental Performance Index 2014
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Performance Index, 2014 Release (2002-2011) displays the 2014 EPI ranks from 178 countries on 20 performance indicators in the following 9 policy categories: health impacts, air quality, water and sanitation, water resources, agriculture, forests, fisheries, biodiversity and habitat, and climate and energy. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H48913SG.

FeatureType.Name: esi:esi-environmental-sustainability-index-2005
FeatureType.Title: Environmental Sustainability Index 2005
FeatureType.Abstract: Environmental Sustainability Index, 2005 Release (1980-2000) displays the total ESI which provides a composite profile of national environmental stewardship based on a compilation of 21 indicators. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H40V89R6.

FeatureType.Name: gpw-v3:gpw-v3-centroids
FeatureType.Title: GPW v3: Centroids
FeatureType.Abstract: Centroids, v3 (1990, 1995, 2000, 2005, 2010, 2015) displays centroids based on the 399,781 input administrative units used in GPWv3. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4TT4NWQ.

FeatureType.Name: gpw-v3:gpw-v3-coastlines
FeatureType.Title: GPW v3: Coastlines
FeatureType.Abstract: Coastlines, v3 (2000) displays coastlines derived from the GPWv3 land area grid and designed for cartographic use with the GPWv3 population raster data sets. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4Q23X5Q.

FeatureType.Name: grump-v1:grump-v1-settlement-points
FeatureType.Title: GRUMP v1: Settlement Points
FeatureType.Abstract: Settlement Points, v1 (1990, 1995, 2000) displays populated places with population estimates. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4M906KR.

FeatureType.Name: grand-v1:grand-v1-dams-rev01
FeatureType.Title: Global Reservoir and Dam Database: Dams
FeatureType.Abstract: Dams, v1.01 (2011) displays dams that were geospatially referenced and assigned to polygons depicting reservoir outlines at high spatial resolution. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4N877QK.

FeatureType.Name: grand-v1:grand-v1-reservoirs-rev01
FeatureType.Title: Global Reservoir and Dam Database: Reservoirs
FeatureType.Abstract: Reservoirs, v1.01 (2011) displays reservoirs that were delineated from high spatial resolution satellite imagery available as polygon shape files. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4HH6H08.

FeatureType.Name: india:india-india-village-level-geospatial-socio-econ-1991-2001_female-literates-gj-1991
FeatureType.Title: India Village-Level_Female Literates Gujarat 1991
FeatureType.Abstract: The India Village-Level_Female Literates Gujarat 1991 map layer is part of the India Village-Level Geospatial Socio-Economic Data Set: 1991, 2001. It displays female literates for the year 1991 in the state of Gujarat. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4CN71ZJ.

FeatureType.Name: india:india-india-village-level-geospatial-socio-econ-1991-2001_female-literates-gj-2001
FeatureType.Title: India Village-Level_Female Literates Gujarat 2001
FeatureType.Abstract: The India Village-Level_Female Literates Gujarat 2001 map layer is part of the India Village-Level Geospatial Socio-Economic Data Set: 1991, 2001. It displays female literates for the year 2001 in the state of Gujarat. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4CN71ZJ.

FeatureType.Name: india:india-india-village-level-geospatial-socio-econ-1991-2001_male-agricultural-laborers-mh-1991
FeatureType.Title: India Village-Level_Male Agricultural Laborers Maharashtra 1991
FeatureType.Abstract: The India Village-Level_Male Agricultural Laborers Maharashtra 1991 map layer is part of the India Village-Level Geospatial Socio-Economic Data Set: 1991, 2001. It displays male agricultural laborers for the year 1991 in the state of Maharashtra. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4CN71ZJ.

FeatureType.Name: india:india-india-village-level-geospatial-socio-econ-1991-2001_male-agricultural-laborers-mh-2001
FeatureType.Title: India Village-Level_Male Agricultural Laborers Maharashtra 2001
FeatureType.Abstract: The India Village-Level_Male Agricultural Laborers Maharashtra 2001 map layer is part of the India Village-Level Geospatial Socio-Economic Data Set: 1991, 2001. It displays male agricultural laborers for the year 2001 in the state of Maharashtra. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4CN71ZJ.

FeatureType.Name: india:india-india-village-level-geospatial-socio-econ-1991-2001_male-cultivators-gj-1991
FeatureType.Title: India Village-Level_Male Cultivators Gujarat 1991
FeatureType.Abstract: The India Village-Level_Male Cultivators Gujarat 1991 map layer is part of the India Village-Level Geospatial Socio-Economic Data Set: 1991, 2001. It displays male cultivators for the year 1991 in the state of Gujarat. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4CN71ZJ.

FeatureType.Name: india:india-india-village-level-geospatial-socio-econ-1991-2001_male-cultivators-gj-2001
FeatureType.Title: India Village-Level_Male Cultivators Gujarat 2001
FeatureType.Abstract: The India Village-Level_Male Cultivators Gujarat 2001 map layer is part of the India Village-Level Geospatial Socio-Economic Data Set: 1991, 2001. It displays male cultivators for the year 2001 in the state of Gujarat. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4CN71ZJ.

FeatureType.Name: india:india-india-village-level-geospatial-socio-econ-1991-2001_total-population-mh-1991
FeatureType.Title: India Village-Level_Total Population Maharashtra 1991
FeatureType.Abstract: The India Village-Level_Total Population Maharashtra 1991 map layer is part of the India Village-Level Geospatial Socio-Economic Data Set: 1991, 2001. It displays total population for the year 1991 in the state of Maharashtra. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4CN71ZJ.

FeatureType.Name: india:india-india-village-level-geospatial-socio-econ-1991-2001_total-population-mh-2001
FeatureType.Title: India Village-Level_Total Population Maharashtra 2001
FeatureType.Abstract: The India Village-Level_Total Population Maharashtra 2001 map layer is part of the India Village-Level Geospatial Socio-Economic Data Set: 1991, 2001. It displays total population for the year 2001 in the state of Maharashtra. See more information at: https://doi.org/10.7927/H4CN71ZJ.

FeatureType.Name: cartographic:00-grump-v1-national-admin-boundaries
FeatureType.Title: National Boundaries Large Scale
FeatureType.Abstract: National Boundaries Large Scale represents high resolution administrative boundaries for 231 world countries. This data was derived by the GRUMP Beta project and has been designed be visible at scales larger than 2 Arc Minutes.

FeatureType.Name: cartographic:00-gpw-v3-national-admin-boundaries
FeatureType.Title: National Boundaries Medium Scale
FeatureType.Abstract: National Boundaries Medium Scale represents medium resolution administrative boundaries for 231 world countries. This data was derived by the GPWv3 project and has been designed be visible at scales between 20 Arc Minutes and 2 Arc Minutes.

FeatureType.Name: cartographic:00-gpw-v3-national-admin-boundaries_generalized
FeatureType.Title: National Boundaries Small Scale
FeatureType.Abstract: National Boundaries Small Scale represent low resolution generalized administrative boundaries for 231 world countries. This data was derived through the generalization of GPWv3 National Boundaries and designed to be viewed at scales smaller than 20 Arc Minutes

FeatureType.Name: ipcc:ipcc-ar4-observed-climate-impacts
FeatureType.Title: Observed Climate Change Impacts
FeatureType.Abstract: Fourth Assessment Report (AR4) Observed Climate Change Impacts, v1 (1970-2004) displays statistical significance of observed responses to climate change in the physical, terrestrial, biological systems, and marine-ecosystems. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4542KJV.

FeatureType.Name: nagdc:nagdc-population-landscape-climate-estimates-v3_coastal-proximity-2010
FeatureType.Title: Percentage of Population in Proximity to the Coast
FeatureType.Abstract: Population, Landscape, And Climate Estimates (PLACE), v3 (1990, 2000, 2010): Population in Proximity to the Coast (%) displays percentage of national-level aggregations of territorial extent and population size by coastal proximity. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4F769GP.

FeatureType.Name: lecz:lecz-slr-impacts-ramsar-wetlands_centroids
FeatureType.Title: Ramsar: Centroids (All Sites)
FeatureType.Abstract: Sea Level Rise Impacts on Ramsar Wetlands of International Importance, v1 (2000-2010): Centroids displays all coastal Ramsar site locations at risk to inundation as a consequence of sea level rise. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4CC0XMD.

FeatureType.Name: lecz:lecz-slr-impacts-ramsar-wetlands_polygons
FeatureType.Title: Ramsar: Polygons (Sites with Defined Bounds)
FeatureType.Abstract: Sea Level Rise Impacts on Ramsar Wetlands of International Importance, v1 (2000-2010): Polygons displays Ramsar site boundaries with or without risk to inundation as a consequence of sea level rise. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4CC0XMD.

FeatureType.Name: other:wwf-terrestrial-biomes
FeatureType.Title: Terrestrial Biomes from WWF
FeatureType.Abstract: This layer depicts the 16 terrestrial biomes used in the 2007 NRMI Natural Resource Management Index (NRMI). The biomes are derived from the World Wildlife Fund (WWF) ecoregions layer.

FeatureType.Name: superfund:superfund-epa-national-priorities-list-ciesin-mod-v2
FeatureType.Title: U.S. EPA National Priorities List Sites
FeatureType.Abstract: U.S. EPA National Priorities List Sites with CIESIN Modifications, v2 (2014) displays 1,747 sites that are proposed, currently on, or deleted from the Final NPL as of February 27, 2014. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H44X55RB.

FeatureType.Name: sdei:sdei-global-uhi-2013_dayurbmean
FeatureType.Title: UHI: Average Summer Daytime Maximum Surface Temperature
FeatureType.Abstract: Global Urban Heat Island (UHI) Data Set, v1 (2013): Average Summer Daytime Maximum Surface Temperature displays the Summer daytime maximum temperature (degrees Celsius) during July-August (Julian days 185-224) in the northern hemisphere and January-February (Julian days 001-040) in the southern hemisphere averaged within urban extents defined by the GRUMPv1 data set. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4H70CRF.

FeatureType.Name: sdei:sdei-global-uhi-2013_nighturbmean
FeatureType.Title: UHI: Average Summer Nighttime Minimum Surface Temperature
FeatureType.Abstract: Global Urban Heat Island (UHI) Data Set, v1 (2013): Average Summer Nighttime Minimum Surface Temperature displays the Summer nighttime minimum temperature (degrees Celsius) during July-August (Julian days 185-224) in the northern hemisphere and January-February (Julian days 001-040) in the southern hemisphere averaged within urban boundaries defined by the GRUMPv1 urban extents data set. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4H70CRF.

FeatureType.Name: sdei:sdei-global-uhi-2013_daytdif
FeatureType.Title: UHI: Summer Daytime Urban-Rural Temperature Difference
FeatureType.Abstract: Global Urban Heat Island (UHI) Data Set, v1 (2013): Summer Daytime Urban-Rural Temperature Difference displays the Summer daytime maximum temperature differences (degrees Celsius) between urban extents and 10km surrounding buffers. Summer is defined as July-August (Julian days 185-224) in the northern hemisphere and January-February (Julian days 001-040) in the southern hemisphere. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4H70CRF.

FeatureType.Name: sdei:sdei-global-uhi-2013_nighttdif
FeatureType.Title: UHI: Summer Nighttime Urban-Rural Temperature Difference
FeatureType.Abstract: Global Urban Heat Island (UHI) Data Set, v1 (2013): Summer Nighttime Urban-Rural Temperature Difference displays the Summer nighttime minimum temperature differences (degrees Celsius) between urban extents and 10km surrounding buffers. Summer is defined as July-August (Julian days 185-224) in the northern hemisphere and January-February (Julian days 001-040) in the southern hemisphere. See more information at http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4H70CRF.
